title: The Last Vampire
description: Elmo Land was a young man when he first met strange and enigmatic Regina Watson. He'd heard she was crazy, but Elmo was drawn to her even though he knew something wasn't right. Then he noticed the bite marks on her neck. That was the beginning of Elmo's new life--and the beginning of a headlong descent into a dark world of compulsion and desire--and the ever-present need to feed.
author: T.M. Wright
